page.title: 04Local History in Brafferton
page.content:
(continued from page 3) It has a{threshing mill}within its wall so it has a preservation order attached to it.
Finally there is Coatham House Farm which used to be a stopping off point for{stage coaches}on the route between Durham and Darlington and the South.
In terms of personalities, perhaps the most famous recent residents in the area were the{Colling brothers}who lived at Ketton Hall for a time and who bred their famous bull "Comet". They founded the well-known breed of cattle,the{Durham shorthorns,}at the end of the 18th century.
